<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The "delete the attribute" button must delete the corresponding attribute instead of the first one <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Noticed that if we try to delete an attribute while creating a task using the button "delete the attribute": <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/98796993-1337af00-241d-11eb-8166-50ae08338504.png></denchmark-link>
it deletes the first attribute from the list instead of the selected one: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/98797115-319daa80-241d-11eb-84a9-502bc3a9294f.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Try to add some attributes while creating a new CVAT task Then try to delete any attribute except the first one
